QuestData.Title: The Thrill of Exploration
QuestData.Description:
Name's Acadia, Acadia Chistlestone!
I represent the interests of the Explorer's League at this site. Where there's dirt to be turned, we're happy to do the digging!
<Acadia's smile falters.>
These Dark Iron, though, they're keen on delving deeper and faster than I'm comfortable with. Since you're a strong, capable member of the Alliance, do you think you could ah... lead by example?
Go on, there's a fresh fossil here that could use some attention.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Acadia Chistlestone recover a Xibalan fossil.
